contents.text: Welcome to Collective Health, your partner in workforce health management based in San Francisco.
For new employer inquiries and onboarding assistance, press 1.
To speak with one of our sales representatives, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to sales.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing and onboarding steps for enrolling my company
I want to speak with sales about enrolling my veteran-owned company in your health plan
I’d like to speak with sales about integrating your API for our new employer onboarding.
I need help setting up my company’s new account and onboarding.
Discuss health plan options and onboarding steps with a sales representative for my student research group

contents.text: To schedule a live demo of our Workforce Health Management System, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our demonstration team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live demo of the workforce health management platform
I’d like to schedule a live demo of the Collective Health platform before we sign up
I want to schedule a live demo of your workforce health management platform’s analytics dashboard.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your health management system.
Arrange a live demonstration of the Collective Health workforce management platform for our university lab

contents.text: For support with your existing services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue with my existing account dashboard
I’m having trouble accessing my existing account dashboard and need technical assistance
I need technical support troubleshooting our SAML SSO integration.
I’m having trouble accessing my existing service and need technical support.
Get technical support to resolve an integration issue with the health benefits portal

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify a recent unexpected charge on my billing statement
I need to clarify unexpected charges on our current billing statement
I need to review our subscription billing details and invoice allocation.
I have questions about my bill and need help with my account balance.
Inquire about recent billing charges and clarify invoice details for our department's health services
